vsParam:
Uh!?
What are you doing here in the Academy!?

Hmm. Something concerns me.
It's about... Amaryllis.

Ah. You guys defeated one of the monsters
in our territory earlier.

But, Amaryllis has been dispirited ever since.
... I thought that you might know what happened.

I see. So that's what happened...
Phew...

I knew that mermaids may turn into monsters.
But I didn't expect to see a friend of Amaryllis...

Oh. It put you guys in a difficult place as well, right?
I'm so sorry about that.

Hmm. You don't need to apologize to us, Mr. Rod!
Dangerous monsters must be defeated...

Having said that... that's Amaryllis's friend.
But, that shouldn't change things, right...

Hmm... If we do nothing about it, even Amaryllis may turn
into a monster. It would be horrible if we just let it happen.

And... Smile is the most kawaii thing!
I don't like to see a sullen face!

Ha ha. Yeah...!
We'll figure out a way to cheer Amaryllis up.

Wow. Sorel!?
What's going on with you? You hungry!?

No!
It's a way to cheer Amaryllis up!

Ha.
Didn't Amaryllis once say that food on land is delicious?

Eating delicious food is the best way to boost our spirits
when we feel depressed. This is a universal truth!

Yeah. Maybe you're right.
Delicious cuisines are a precursor to happiness.

Gee.
If that's true, [px], you're up!

Yeah...! [px]! For the happiness of Amaryllis,
please make some delicious cuisine!

I must ask this favor of you...!
Please, can you help me...?

Thanks. I'm grateful...!
So, for Amaryllis...!
